Pet Manager Lundy: Is this Work Hammer for me? Thank you! You will be blessed! What? Money? I don't have any, silly! By the way, I need another favor! My son went to Talking Island seeking adventure! He'll be graduating soon, and I want to send him this Work Hammer as a graduation present. But there are some fearsome bandits laying in wait around here. You must kill them! Of course, I'll still need the Work Hammer.
